description: This Java configuration class sets up JPA auditing and registers a custom authentication filter for URLs matching /api/* in a Spring Boot application.

classes.name: AuditConfig
classes.description: Spring configuration class for setting up JPA auditing and a custom filter.

methods.name: myAuditorProvider
methods.description: Bean providing the current auditor for JPA auditing, returning an instance of AuditorAwareConfig.

methods.name: authUserFilter
methods.description: Bean registering the AppAuthUserFilter for API URL patterns.
